name: Magnetize
description:
Magnetize:

A short and challenging platformer revolving around a single mechanic, Magnets!
This game was a submission for Weekly Game Jam 19.

The goal:

Make your way through a guarded factory, utilizing your MagneGUN, trying to reach the end of each room without dying in the process.

Control keys:

WASD keys to move. Use your mouse to pick-up and throw objects.

Music was made by Blunt (blunt.tv).
